    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40cf0aeb-02b4-42f1-24a2-6d578e496ff5#1#3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Zöldhalompusztai szkíta aranyszarvas.</string>
            <string language="en">The Scythian Golden Deer of Zöldhalompuszta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Scythian goldenen Rotwild von 
Zöldhalompuszta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les cerfs communs d'or de Scythian de 
Zöldhalompuszta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os cervos dourados de Scythian de 
Zöldhalompuszta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I cervi dorati di Scythian di Zöldhalompuszta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα χρυσά ελάφια Scythian Zφldhalompuszta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los ciervos de oro de Scythian de 
Zöldhalompuszta</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">aranylemezből domborított szarvas hárta forduló alakja.</string>
            <string language="en">The looking back figure of a deer cambered from gold leaf</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">ötvösség,  Kr. e. 4. század,  szkíta,  Zöldhalompusztai szkíta aranyszarvas,  aranylemez,  trébelés,  cizellálás,  poncolás,  </string>
            <string language="en">goldsmith's art, 4th century BC, Scythian, Golden Deer of Zöldhalompuszta, gold leaf, repoussage, chasing, granulation</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die schauende rückseitige Abbildung eines 
Rotwilds krümmte sich vom Goldblatt</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La figure arrière semblante d'un cerf commun a 
donné du carrossage de la feuille d'or</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A figura traseira olhando de um cervo curvou-se da
folha do ouro</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La figura posteriore sembrante di un cervo si è 
incurvata dal foglio dell'oro</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο πίσω αριθμός κοιτάγματος ενός ελαφιού από το 
χρυσό φύλλο</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La figura posterior que miraba de un ciervo combó
de la hoja del oro</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kunst des Goldschmieds, 4. Jahrhundert BC, Scythian, 
goldenes Rotwild von Zöldhalompuszta, Goldblatt, repoussage, jagend, 
Granulation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'art de l'orfèvre, 4ème siècle BC, Scythian, cerf 
commun d'or de Zöldhalompuszta, feuille d'or, repoussage, chassant, 
granulation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">arte do goldsmith, ô século BC, Scythian, cervo 
dourado de Zöldhalompuszta, folha do ouro, repoussage, perseguindo, 
granulation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">arte dell'orafo, quarto secolo BC, Scythian, cervo 
dorato di Zöldhalompuszta, foglio dell'oro, repoussage, inseguente, 
granulazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τέχνη χρυσοχόου, 4$ος αιώνας Π.Χ., Scythian, χρυσά 
ελάφια Zφldhalompuszta, χρυσό φύλλο, repoussage, χάραξη, 
κοκκιοποίηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">arte del orfebre, 4to siglo A.C., Scythian, ciervo de 
oro de Zöldhalompuszta, hoja del oro, repoussage, persiguiendo, 
granulación</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
